languages.text: {n}Вы бессильны перед удушающим страхом. Тревога окатывает вас с головой, словно волна — и, скрывшись под ее поверхностью, вы на несколько мгновений перестаете слышать голос Кибеллы.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ваша воля бессильна через удушающим страхом. На несколько долгих мгновений вы позволяете ему полностью охватить ваш разум и почти перестаете слышать голос Кибеллы.{/n}

languages.text: {n}You are powerless before this smothering fear. The anxiety swallows you whole like a wave, and as you are pulled under, you can no longer hear Kibellah's voice for a few long seconds.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы бессильны перед удушающим страхом. Тревога окатывает вас с головой, словно волна — и, скрывшись под ее поверхностью, вы на несколько мгновений перестаете слышать голос Кибеллы.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You are powerless before this smothering fear. The anxiety swallows you whole like a wave, and as you are pulled under, you lose Kibellah's voice for a few long seconds.{/n}
{n}You are powerless before this smothering fear. The anxiety swallows you whole like a wave, and as you are pulled under, you lose Kibellah's voice for a few long seconds.{/n}

{n}You are powerless before this smothering fear. The anxiety swallows you whole like a wave, and as you are pulled under, you can no longer hear Kibellah's voice for a few long seconds.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du bist machtlos gegen diese erdrückende Angst. Die Unruhe verschluckt dich wie eine Welle, und als du hinabgezogen wirst, hörst du Kibellahs Stimme einige sehr lange Sekunden lang nicht mehr.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are powerless before this smothering fear. The anxiety swallows you whole like a wave, and as you are pulled under, you can no longer hear Kibellah's voice for a few long seconds.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du bist machtlos gegen diese erdrückende Angst. Die Unruhe verschluckt dich wie eine Welle, und als du hinabgezogen wirst, hörst du Kibellahs Stimme einige sehr lange Sekunden lang nicht mehr.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Eres impotente ante este pavor asfixiante. La ansiedad te devora como una ola, y, cuando te cubre por completo, eres incapaz de oír la voz de Kibellah durante unos largos segundos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are powerless before this smothering fear. The anxiety swallows you whole like a wave, and as you are pulled under, you can no longer hear Kibellah's voice for a few long seconds.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Eres impotente ante este pavor asfixiante. La ansiedad te devora como una ola, y, cuando te cubre por completo, eres incapaz de oír la voz de Kibellah durante unos largos segundos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}この窒息しそうな恐怖を前に、あなたは無力だった。不安は大波となってあなたを飲み込む。不安に引きずり込まれる中で、キベラの声さえもが数秒の間、聞こえなくなる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are powerless before this smothering fear. The anxiety swallows you whole like a wave, and as you are pulled under, you can no longer hear Kibellah's voice for a few long seconds.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}この窒息しそうな恐怖を前に、あなたは無力だった。不安は大波となってあなたを飲み込む。不安に引きずり込まれる中で、キベラの声さえもが数秒の間、聞こえなくなる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}恐惧令你感到窒息，你无能为力。焦虑仿佛浪潮一样将你吞没，你没入其中，好几秒钟都没听到绮贝菈的声音。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are powerless before this smothering fear. The anxiety swallows you whole like a wave, and as you are pulled under, you can no longer hear Kibellah's voice for a few long seconds.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}恐惧令你感到窒息，你无能为力。焦虑仿佛浪潮一样将你吞没，你没入其中，好几秒钟都没听到绮贝菈的声音。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous êtes {mf|impuissant|impuissante} face à cette terreur étouffante. Telle une vague, l'angoisse vous submerge et, pendant de longues secondes, vous ne parvenez plus à entendre la voix de Kibellah.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are powerless before this smothering fear. The anxiety swallows you whole like a wave, and as you are pulled under, you can no longer hear Kibellah's voice for a few long seconds.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous êtes {mf|impuissant|impuissante} face à cette terreur étouffante. Telle une vague, l'angoisse vous submerge et, pendant de longues secondes, vous ne parvenez plus à entendre la voix de Kibellah.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bu boğucu korkunun karşısında hiç gücün yok. Endişe, bir dalga misali seni tek lokmada yutuyor. Dibe çekilmenle birlikte çok daha uzun geçen saniyeler boyunca Kibellah'nın sesini duyamıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are powerless before this smothering fear. The anxiety swallows you whole like a wave, and as you are pulled under, you can no longer hear Kibellah's voice for a few long seconds.{/n}
